content.question:
Moving from left to right.

The curve begins high in the second quadrant and moves gradually downward and to the right, passing through the x-axis, and leveling off as it reaches a minimum in the third quadrant.

The curve then moves gradually upward and to the right, passing through the y-axis near the origin, passing through the x-axis, and leveling off as it reaches a maximum in the first quadrant just above the x-axis.

The curve then moves downward and to the right, leveling off as it reaches a minimum on the x-axis.

From the point on the x-axis, the curve then moves gradually upward and to the right, high in the first quadrant where the curve ends.

​The figure shown is the graph of a polynomial function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="0.25 open parentheses x minus 5 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 8 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="0.25 open parentheses x plus 5 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 8 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="0.25 open parentheses x minus 5 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 8 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="0.25 open parentheses x plus 5 close parentheses squared open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x minus 8 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="0.25 open parentheses x minus 5 close parentheses squared open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 8 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
